titleStmt.title: A catalogue containing variety of books of the common & statute law, ancient and modern, together with history, herauldry, travels, romances, poetry &c. will be exposed to sale by way of auction on Thursday the 18th day of February, 1685/6 at the auction-house on Ave-Mary Lane, over-against the Black Swan near Ludgate-Street / by Edward Millington, bookseller.
titleStmt.author: Millington, Edward, d. 1703.

titleStmt.title: A catalogue containing variety of books of the common & statute law, ancient and modern, together with history, herauldry, travels, romances, poetry &c. will be exposed to sale by way of auction on Thursday the 18th day of February, 1685/6 at the auction-house on Ave-Mary Lane, over-against the Black Swan near Ludgate-Street / by Edward Millington, bookseller.
titleStmt.author: Millington, Edward, d. 1703.

notesStmt.note: "Catalogues are distributed from Mr. Timothy Goodwins at the Maiden-head in Fleet-street, Mr. William Millers at the Acorn in St. Pauls church-yard, Mr. George Powel, overgainst Lincolns-Inn in Chancery Lane, booksellers, and at Johns Coffee-House in Fullers Rents, near Grays-Inn, 1685/6.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
